Posts.Content: Amylynn444 wrote: hi! I went in for my yearly earlier this month and my doctor said she was going to send me in for a mammogram. It was my first one. The day after my mammogram the doctor called and said that there was some abnormalities and that she wasn't ordering and MRI. The day after my MRI she called and ordered and ultrasound because of an abnormality at 6 o'clock on right breast. After the ultrasound she called and Told me that the spot is probably benign and we should do short term follow up in three to six months. I'm an optimist by nature but I can't help but feel rattled after all this imaging... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just a little sketched out.. Amylynn444 barbe1958
